name: A Collection of Christmas Carols
tagline: A Book of more than 150 traditional Christmas Carols
body: You can buy the book on Amazon.com here or you can get the spiral bound edition through Lulu, [here](http://www.lulu.com/content/paperback-book/a-collection-of-christmas-carols-%2885x11%29/12933490). You can download a PDF of the entire book in one of these formats: * [Tablet version (no margins)](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/ccc-playbook.pdf) * [8.5x11](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/ccc.pdf) And here are the MIDIs: * [(midi)](downloads/A Carol for Christmas Eve.midi) A Carol for Christmas Eve * [(midi)](downloads/A Child this day is born.midi) A Child this day is born * [(midi)](downloads/A Christmas Round.midi) A Christmas Round * [(midi)](downloads/A Cradle-Song of the Blessed Virgin.midi) A Cradle-Song of the Blessed
